title: Why Some Crypto Firms Are Suspending Services in the U.K.
description: Luno, Bybit and PayPal have recently withdrawn certain services from the U.K. – just ahead of tough new promotions rules for crypto firms coming into effect.

title: Cardano-based Ardana Stablecoin Project Receives Investigation From Xerberus
description: In the investigative report, Xerberus alleges that Ardana executives, including CEO Ryan Motovu, siphoned off 80% of the project's funds into a personal wallet.

title: Blockchain Architects: Invaluable in Shaping the Future of Various Industries
description: Blockchain technology has gained significant traction in recent years, potentially revolutionizing various industries. The investment in blockchain solutions surged from $6.6 billion in 2021 to nearly $12 billion in 2022. This technology holds the promise of reducing banks’ operational costs by around 30%, translating to over $10 billion in annual savings.  The demand for blockchain ... Read more

title: Young Apex Legends Prodigy Lilfredson Dominates in CS2 with Mouse and Keyboard
description: In a remarkable display of talent and adaptability, 10-year-old Apex Legends sensation Lilfredson has transitioned from the world of controllers to the precision of a mouse and keyboard in the world of Counter-Strike 2 (CS2). title: Meta’s Reality Labs Division Plans Layoffs in Silicon Unit
description: In recent developments, Meta, previously known as Facebook, is preparing for workforce adjustments within its Reality Labs division, with a specific focus on its silicon unit. title: MATIC Whale Makes Biggest Move Since July, Price Spikes 4%
description:
The largest Polygon (MATIC) transaction since July 2023 happened yesterday, according to an X post shared by the market intelligence platform Santiment. The post indicated that a whale moved about 37 million MATIC tokens from a Proof of Stake (PoS) wallet to a 3 year-old wallet. The transferred tokens were estimated to be worth $20.7 […]
